data.name: CorVel Corporation
responsibilities: Modernized internal financial systems by migrating from Silverlight to Angular and .NET Core microservices with RESTful APIs.
Developed enterprise invoicing application for 100+ users with Angular, .NET Core, and SQL Server; integrated with Azure DevOps CI/CD pipelines.
Designed high-performance rules-based decision engine using in-memory processing, achieving less than 100ms response times.
Maintained and optimized large-scale legacy systems (4000+ database objects in SQL Server).
Led distributed engineering team (4 developers) using Agile/Scrum, sprint planning, and code reviews.

data.name: adidas Group CIS
responsibilities: Architected enterprise-grade applications for 1,000+ retail staff using Angular, ReactJS, ASP.NET Web API, and SQL Server.
Migrated legacy AngularJS apps to Angular, improving maintainability and performance.
Integrated HR and merchandising systems via SSIS, APIs, and SFTP; enabled real-time synchronization across departments.
Led Agile team of 4 developers; coordinated with global teams, performed code reviews, and ensured sprint delivery.

data.name: Transaero Airlines
responsibilities: Developed multilingual web portal using ASP.NET Web Forms, SQL Server, and jQuery for international representatives.
